## node-gpu v{version}

<!-- Write release notes here -->

### Changes
- List of changes
- Bug fixes
- New features

### Installation

```bash
npm install node-gpu@{version}
```

### Prebuilt Binaries

This release includes prebuilt native binaries for:
- **Windows** (x64, ia32)
- **macOS** (x64, arm64)
- **Linux** (x64, arm64)

For Node.js versions: 16.x, 18.x, 20.x, 22.x

If a prebuilt binary is not available for your platform, the package will automatically compile from source.

### GPU Support

- ✅ NVIDIA GPUs (via NVML)
- ✅ AMD GPUs (via ADLX)
- ✅ Intel GPUs (via platform APIs)

### Requirements

- Node.js >= 16.0.0
- Appropriate GPU drivers installed (NVIDIA, AMD, or Intel)

### Checksums

Binary checksums are included with each asset for verification.

---

For full documentation, see: https://github.com/oxmc/node-gpu#readme
